dmca.title: [ABUSE] Stolen Content
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 24, 2006 2:36 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Stolen Content

This message was received at abuse@theplanet.com on Friday, March 24, 2006
at
04:20:11 and concerns a matter for which responsibility is delegated to your
team. The message and headers follow.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

SUBJECT:
[ABUSE] Stolen Content

MESSAGE BODY:
Hi,

The site 

http://www.htmllive.com/

is full of stolen copyright content which I found to be hosted by you. Each
of the the drop-down menu represents a site which is stolen.

For example my site is;
www.addglitter.com

they copied this at;
http://www.htmllive.com/sparkle

I will need to take further action if the content is not removed.

Regards,
Nick Valoti
